subject: Soccer
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Red Bulls traded midfielder Dave van den Bergh to F.C. Dallas for forward Dominic Oduro and a second-round selection (18th over all) in Thursday’s Major League Soccer draft. The teams also swapped first-round picks — the Red Bulls will select 11th over all; Dallas will select 14th.
